comments:
While attempting to close Eclipse, most of the UI disappeared but the window
would not go away.  After waiting several minutes with no activity, I attempted
to close a few more times by clicking the upper right corner 'x'.  Eventually
had to end task, resulting in a GPF.  The .log contents below show the results,
including additional entries caused by clicking close after the UI had become
unresponsive.

likewise, I am very attached to detached views

Most useless feature ever ...
